sustain.description: Items providing Health per 5 seconds (HP5), Mana per 5 seconds (MP5), Lifesteal, or direct healing
sustain.priority: Highest - Critical due to inability to recall to base

anti_heal.description: Items that reduce enemy healing effectiveness

aura.description: Items providing beneficial effects to nearby allies or detrimental effects to enemies
aura.priority: High - Effective due to constant team proximity

defensive.description: Items focused on Protections, Health, and Crowd Control Reduction
defensive.priority: Essential for survival in constant teamfights

offensive.description: Items providing raw damage, Penetration, Attack Speed, and Critical Strike Chance
offensive.priority: Secondary to sustain but necessary for damage output

Amanita Charm.name: Amanita Charm

active.name: Mushroom Healing
active.description: Create a Mushroom that Heals allied gods within 6.4m for 2% HP every 0.5s. Lasts for 5s.

Amanita Charm.assault_utility: Team-wide healing active - essential for sustain
Amanita Charm.notes: OB10: Tick frequency changed to 0.5s from 1s, heal reduced to 2% from 3.5%

Divine Ruin.name: Divine Ruin

passive.name: Anti-Heal + Chain Lightning
passive.description: Enemy gods hit by your basic attacks or abilities have 50% reduced healing for 6s and trigger a chain lightning, damaging the target and up to 4 nearby enemies for 40 damage + 7.5% of your Intelligence. This can only occur once every 20 seconds.

Divine Ruin.assault_utility: Mage anti-heal with bonus poke damage
Divine Ruin.notes: OB10: Intelligence decreased from 105 to 85, new chain lightning passive added

Brawler's Ruin.name: Brawler's Ruin

passive.name: Anti-Heal + Team Buff
passive.description: Enemy gods hit by your basic attacks or abilities have 50% reduced healing for 6s. Getting a kill or assist on an enemy god creates a field around you that lasts 6s, providing allies within it 5 + 1 Per Level Strength and Intelligence.

Brawler's Ruin.assault_utility: Physical anti-heal with team buff on kills
Brawler's Ruin.notes: OB10: Strength decreased from 65 to 50, new team buff passive added

Contagion.name: Contagion

active.name: AoE Anti-Heal
active.description: Target a location causing any enemy Gods within to be debuffed with 75% reduced Healing for 6s. If an enemy uses an ability while afflicted, your cooldowns are reduced by 0.25s.

Contagion.assault_utility: Tank AoE anti-heal with CDR benefit
Contagion.notes: Released May 19 in OB10. Builds from Ruinous Venom + Olmec Blue + Engraved Guard + 850g

Ruinous Ankh.name: Ruinous Ankh

passive.name: Anti-Heal Aura
passive.description: Enemies within 4m have 40% reduced Healing. The anti-heal effect is increased by up to +50% at close range and decreases by up to -50% at maximum range.

Ruinous Ankh.assault_utility: Tank anti-heal aura with range scaling
Ruinous Ankh.notes: OB10: Passive effect shifted to range-based scaling

Stone of Gaia.name: Stone of Gaia

passive.name: Personal Regeneration
passive.description: Exceptional personal HP regeneration for sustained presence in fights

Stone of Gaia.assault_utility: Personal sustain for tanks and bruisers
Stone of Gaia.notes: Core sustain item for frontline gods

Bloodforge.name: Bloodforge

passive.name: Immediate Lifesteal
passive.description: Physical lifesteal without stacking requirements - immediate sustain

Bloodforge.assault_utility: Immediate lifesteal for physical damage dealers
Bloodforge.notes: Replaces banned Devourer's Gauntlet in assault

Bancroft's Talon.name: Bancroft's Talon

passive.name: Power Scaling Lifesteal
passive.description: Magical lifesteal with power scaling based on missing health

Bancroft's Talon.notes: Core sustain item for magical gods

passive.name: Health/Mana on Kills
passive.description: Restores health and mana on kills and assists

passive.name: Percentage Health Regen
passive.description: You heal 0.5% of your Maximum Health per second

Rod of Asclepius.name: Rod of Asclepius

passive.name: Healing Amplification Aura
passive.description: Allies within 8.8m have 15% increased Healing

active.name: Anti-Heal Cleanse
active.description: Remove and prevent all Anti Heal effects for 3s for all allies within 7m

Rod of Asclepius.assault_utility: Amplifies team healing and counters anti-heal

Sovereignty.name: Sovereignty

aura.name: Physical Protection Aura
aura.description: Provides Physical Protection and HP5 to nearby allies

Sovereignty.notes: Core aura item for team protection

Heartward Amulet.name: Heartward Amulet

aura.name: Magical Protection Aura
aura.description: Allied gods within 70 units have their Magical Protections increased by 15 and their MP5 increased by 30

Heartward Amulet.notes: Core aura item for magical protection

Gauntlet of Thebes.name: Gauntlet of Thebes

passive.name: Health Stacking
passive.description: Assists on a minion give 1 Stack and God kills and assists give 5 Stacks. Stacks provide 15 Max Health. Stacks up to 40 times. Evolves at max stacks: Provides an additional 200 Max Health.

Gauntlet of Thebes.notes: Provides health aura to allies when evolved

aura.name: Tower Protection
aura.description: Provides tower protection for diving scenarios

Mystical Mail.name: Mystical Mail

passive.name: AoE Damage Aura
passive.description: Enemies within 4m are dealt 15 + 1 per level Magical Damage per second. Damage increases by up to +50% at close range and decreases by up to -50% at maximum range. Enemies take the full amount as bonus damage if they have a Health Shield.

Mystical Mail.notes: OB10: Added bonus damage vs shields

Rod of Tahuti.name: Rod of Tahuti

passive.name: Intelligence Amplification
passive.description: Gain additional Intelligence equal to 25% of your Intelligence from items

Rod of Tahuti.assault_utility: Major power spike for magical damage

passive.name: Shattering
passive.description: You gain the Shattering effect, granting you 35% Physical and Magical Penetration. This effect does not stack with itself.

passive.name: Shattering
passive.description: You gain the Shattering effect, granting you 35% Physical and Magical Penetration. This effect does not stack with itself.

The Executioner.name: The Executioner

passive.name: Hybrid Power
passive.description: You gain 40 Strength or 70 Intelligence depending on which stat from items is higher

The Executioner.notes: Adapts to your build's primary stat

passive.name: Max Health Damage
passive.description: On Basic Attack hits, deal Physical Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's maximum Health. If the target has over 2000 Health, your basic attack bonus damage scales up, capping at 6% max Health on 2750 HP targets. This only affects gods.

Book of Thoth.name: Book of Thoth

passive.name: Mana Stacking
passive.description: Permanently gain 10 Mana per Stack (1 Stack per 900 Damage Dealt to minions/Jungle Monsters, God damage counts double). Gain INT equal to 4% of Mana from items. Evolves at 50 stacks: Gain +20 INT, +100 Mana, and increases INT gained from Mana to 6%.

Book of Thoth.notes: Core stacking item for magical gods

passive.name: Protection Stacking
passive.description: Once every 5s, when you damage an enemy god, gain a stack of 1 Protection (corresponding to damage type dealt by god). Evolves at 20 stacks of both Protections: Gain additional 5 Protections and 6% Damage Mitigation, or 12% Damage Mitigation if total Protection exceeds 300.

Draconic Scale.name: Draconic Scale

passive.name: Adaptive Protection Stacking
passive.description: Each time you take damage from a God, gain 1 + 2% Bonus Protections against that damage type. Stacks last for 1.5s with a maximum of 10 stacks. Stacks decay by 1 rather than being fully removed.

Draconic Scale.notes: Released May 26 in OB10. Builds from Veve Charm and Stalwart Sigil + 750g

Chronos' Pendant.name: Chronos' Pendant

passive.name: Cooldown Reduction
passive.description: Your ability cooldowns are reduced by 1s every 10s

Chronos' Pendant.assault_utility: CDR and utility for ability-based gods
Chronos' Pendant.notes: Core CDR item for magical gods

passive.name: Burst and Sustain
passive.description: On successful hit of an Ability you gain 1 stack. At 3 Stacks your next Ability that damages an enemy God will deal bonus damage equal to 40% of your Intelligence to each God hit, and will heal yourself and allies within 3.2m for 5 +10 Per Level and will consume the 3 stacks.

active.name: Teleport
active.description: Teleport to a targeted location up to 5.6m away. Can be used while firing another ability. Cannot be activated for 3s upon dealing damage to a god or taking damage from a god. Damaging or Killing an enemy god within 4s of use reduces the cooldown by 30s.
